title: The Busy Pond
description: In The Busy Pond, a boy sees many animals and plants when he goes to the pond. He notices what each animal is doing and what the plants look like. Repetitive text, high-frequency words, and supportive pictures make this book perfect for emerging readers.
reviewWords: busy, cattails, lily pads, pond, turtles, water
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant sound /p/
grammar: Nouns                : Identify nouns as naming words
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and write the high-frequency word they
